00005 //_____________________________________________________________________________________
00006 FitLikelihood::FitLikelihood(TH1* h){
00007     _histogram    = h;
00008     _iniValues[1] = (double)_histogram->GetMean();
00009     _iniValues[0] = (double)_histogram->GetRMS()/2;
00010     _iniValues[2] = _iniValues[0];
00011     _rangeMin     = 0;
00012     _peakInit     = h->GetMean();
00013     for(int i=0;i<2;++i) _rangeInit[i]=0;
00014 }
00015 //______________________________________________________________________________________
00016 double FitLikelihood::findRangeMin(const TH1* clone){
00017     int rmaxbin     = clone->GetXaxis()->FindBin(_peakInit);
00018     int zerobin     = clone->GetXaxis()->FindBin((double)0.);
00019     float content   = 0;
00020     float min       = (float)clone->GetBinContent(zerobin);
00021     int minX        = clone->GetXaxis()->FindBin((double)0);
00022     double histoMin = 0;
00023 
00024     for ( int i=zerobin;i<rmaxbin ;i++ ){
00025         content=(float)clone->GetBinContent(i); 
00026         if((min>=content)) min=content, minX=i;
00027     }
00028 
00029     histoMin=clone->GetXaxis()->GetBinCenter(minX);
00030     if(histoMin<_peakInit/2.&&histoMin>0){
00031         _rangeMin=clone->GetXaxis()->GetBinCenter(minX);
00032     }else{
00033         _rangeMin=0;
00034     }
00035     printf("_rangeMin:\t%.2f\n",_rangeMin);
00036     return _rangeMin;
00037 }
00038 //______________________________________________________________________________________
00039 double FitLikelihood::findPeakInitBezier(int order,int rebin){
00040     TH1* h=(TH1*)_histogram->Clone();
00041     
00042     int rmin_inibin= h->FindBin(_rangeMin);
00043 
00044     for(int i=0;i<rmin_inibin;++i){
00045         h->SetBinContent(i,0);
00046     }
00047     
00048     
00049     float peak;
00050     vector<float> x,y;
00051     int binmin=h->FindBin(_parlimitslo[1]);
00052     int binmax=h->FindBin(_parlimitshi[1]);
00053 
00054     for ( int i=binmin;i<binmax;++i ) {
00055         x.push_back(h->GetBinCenter(i));
00056         y.push_back(h->GetBinContent(i) );
00057     }
00058     _bezier=new Bezier(h,rebin, order,1 );
00059     peak=_bezier->findPeak();
00060     //if(peak>_parlimitslo[1]&&peak<_parlimitshi[1]) _peakInit=(double)peak;  
00061     _peakInit=(double)peak;
00062     _iniValues[1]=(double)peak;
00063     printf("Peak extracted from Bezier function:\t%.3f\n",peak); 
00064     return (double)peak;
00065 }
00066 //______________________________________________________________________________________
00067 FitLikelihood& FitLikelihood::setRange(double left, double right){
00068     _rangeInit[0] = left;
00069     _rangeInit[1] = right;
00070 
00071     if(_rangeInit[0]<_histogram->GetXaxis()->GetXmin() ){
00072         _rangeInit[0]=_histogram->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00073     }
00074     if(_rangeInit[1]>_histogram->GetXaxis()->GetXmax() ){
00075         _rangeInit[1]=_histogram->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00076     }
00077     return *this;
00078 }
00079 //______________________________________________________________________________________
00080 FitLikelihood& FitLikelihood::setIniValues(const double* iniValues){
00081     for(int i=0; i<3;++i) _iniValues[i]=iniValues[i];
00082     return *this;
00083 }

00087     _parlimitslo[1] = peaklo;
00088     _parlimitslo[2] = sigmalo;
00089     return *this;
00090 };

00094     _parlimitshi[1] = peakhi;
00095     _parlimitshi[2] = sigmahi;
00096     return *this;
00097 };

00101     return *this;
00102 }
00103 //______________________________________________________________________________________
00104 RooPlot* FitLikelihood::writeRooroot( const TH1* h,const Langaus* lxg){
00105 
00106     RooRealVar* t = (RooRealVar*)lxg->getLangausBase()->getVariables()->find("t");
00107     RooDataHist data("data","data for t",*t,h);                                           
00108 
00109     RooPlot* Frame = t->frame(Name(h->GetName()),Title(h->GetName()));
00110     data.plotOn(Frame) ;
00111     lxg->getLangausBase()->plotOn(Frame) ;
00112     
00113     return Frame;
00114 }
00115 //______________________________________________________________________________________
00116 TH1* FitLikelihood::cloneHisto(int rbn,int rng,int lps){
00117     assert(_histogram);
00118 
00119     TH1 *clone= (TH1*)_histogram->Clone();  
00120     clone->SetName("clone");
00121     clone->Rebin(rbn);
00122     for(int l=0;l<lps;++l){
00123         Int_t N=_histogram->GetNbinsX();
00124         Int_t p;
00125         Double_t Content;
00126         for(p=rng+1;p<=N-rng-1;++p){
00127             Int_t t=rng;  
00128             do{
00129                 Content=clone->GetBinContent(p)+
00130                     (+_histogram->GetBinContent(p-t)+_histogram->GetBinContent(p+t));
00131                 t--;
00132                 clone->SetBinContent(p,Content);
00133             }while(t>0);
00134             clone->SetBinContent(p,Content/(2*rng+1));
00135         }
00136     }
00137     return clone;
00138 };
